title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
summary: Develop a secure login flow with multi-factor authentication to protect user accounts.
description: Implement user registration and authentication supported by multi-factor verification using OTP, email, or biometric authentication. This ensures secure access and data protection for every login attempt and aligns with financial compliance requirements.

userStories.title: User Registration and Login Setup
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to securely register and log in so that I can access my banking services online.

userStories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to verify my login using an additional layer such as OTP or biometric verification so that my account remains secure.

userStories.title: Password Recovery Functionality
userStories.description: As a customer, I want a secure password reset option so that I can recover my access when necessary.

title: Responsive User Interface Design
summary: Design a responsive UI for consistent performance across all devices.
description: Build a modern, responsive user interface that automatically adapts to different devices and screen sizes including desktop, tablet, and mobile, maintaining usability and accessibility standards.

userStories.title: Responsive Portal Layout
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal to adjust to my screen size so that I can easily use it on any device.

userStories.title: Intuitive Navigation System
userStories.description: As a customer, I want an easy and intuitive navigation system so that I can quickly find the services I need.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile Management
summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying relevant information and services.
description: Develop a dynamic, user-specific dashboard that displays the customer’s profile, eligible banking products, and recent transactions. Provide profile customization options and product recommendations based on eligibility.

userStories.title: Display Personalized Account Information
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view my personalized account summary so that I can easily monitor my banking activities.

userStories.title: Recommend Eligible Products
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see eligible banking products based on my profile so that I can explore relevant services.

title: Account and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable account opening and service modification workflows.
description: Implement a guided, step-by-step workflow allowing customers to open new accounts and request changes to existing services through minimal user interactions, ensuring operational efficiency.

userStories.title: Online Account Opening
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to open an account online so that I do not have to visit a branch.

userStories.title: Service Modification Requests
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking services online so that I can manage changes conveniently.

userStories.title: Save and Resume Applications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to save partially completed applications so that I can return to them later without losing my progress.

title: Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Implement real-time tracking and proactive notifications for customer requests.
description: Develop a notification module that provides real-time status updates and sends automatic email or portal alerts for submitted applications and service modifications.

userStories.title: Display Real-Time Application Status
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see real-time updates on my application so that I know the progress of my request.

userStories.title: Receive Email Notifications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email updates whenever the status of my application changes so that I stay informed.

title: Document Upload and Management System
summary: Enable secure document upload and verification processes.
description: Develop a system that allows customers to securely upload necessary documents for verification using an encrypted storage system and ensure compliance with security and data protection standards.

userStories.title: Secure Document Upload
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to securely upload required documents so that my requests can be processed efficiently.

userStories.title: Document Validation
userStories.description: As a system, I want to validate uploaded documents for type and completeness so that only correct files are processed.

title: Role-Based Access Control
summary: Enforce access permissions based on defined customer and administrative roles.
description: Implement a role-based access control system that restricts access to sensitive information and features based on the user’s role, ensuring customers and bank staff access only authorized resources.

userStories.title: Set Role Definitions and Permissions
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to define separate roles and permissions so that users can only access the information relevant to them.

userStories.title: Apply Role Validation on Login
userStories.description: As a system, I want to enforce role validations during login so that unauthorized actions are prevented.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the portal with the existing core banking platform for synchronized data management.
description: Implement an integration layer for seamless communication between the portal’s database and the core banking system, ensuring up-to-date account and transaction data synchronization for accuracy and performance.

userStories.title: Synchronize Customer Data via APIs
userStories.description: As a system, I want to synchronize customer and account data with the core banking system so that user information is always up-to-date.

userStories.title: Handle Integration Failures Gracefully
userStories.description: As a system, I want to log and recover from integration errors so that services remain uninterrupted.

title: Data Security and Audit Management
summary: Implement strong encryption and maintain complete audit trails of user activity.
description: Enhance data protection with encryption for sensitive user data and create an audit logging framework that records all platform interactions for accountability and compliance.

userStories.title: Encrypt Sensitive Data
userStories.description: As a system, I want to encrypt sensitive user information so that data is secure both in transit and at rest.

userStories.title: Maintain Audit Trail
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view my past actions and service interactions so that I can track my digital banking history.
